DOC.brief_summary: A study about accuracy of pulse oximeter with hypoxemic measurements (Blue sensor, Masimo, Irvine, CA, USA) in children with cyanotic congenital heart disease
DOC.brief_title: Accuracy of Pulse Oximeter With Hypoxemic Measurements
DOC.criteria: clinical diagnosis of cyanotic congenital heart disease weight 2.5kg to 30kg undergoing general anesthesia preoperative SpO2<97%
